[30;1m77 | [0m[35m## Performance[0m
[30;1m78 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m79 | [0m[35mWhile this package is based on [PyMySQL](https://github.com/PyMySQL/PyMySQL)[0m
[30;1m80 | [0m[35mwhich is a pure Python-based MySQL connector, it adds various performance[0m
[30;1m81 | [0m[35menhancements that make it faster than most other connectors. The performance[0m
[30;1m82 | [0m[35mimprovements come from changes to the data conversion functions, cursor implementations,[0m
[30;1m83 | [0m[35mand a C extension that is highly optimized to improve row data reading.[0m

[30;1m58 | [0m[35mThe package can be used both in a pure Python mode and as well as a C accelerated[0m
[30;1m59 | [0m[35mmode. Generally speaking, the C accelerated version of the client can read[0m
[30;1m60 | [0m[35mdata 10X faster than PyMySQL, 2X faster than MySQLdb, and 1.5X faster than[0m
[30;1m61 | [0m[35mmysql.connector. All of this is done without having to install any 3rd party[0m
[30;1m62 | [0m[35mMySQL libraries![0m

[30;1m50 | [0m[35m## Performance[0m
[30;1m51 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m52 | [0m[35mWhile this package is based on [PyMySQL](https://github.com/PyMySQL/PyMySQL)[0m
[30;1m53 | [0m[35mwhich is a pure Python-based MySQL connector, it adds various performance[0m
[30;1m54 | [0m[35menhancements that make it faster than most other connectors. The performance[0m
[30;1m55 | [0m[35mimprovements come from changes to the data conversion functions, cursor implementations,[0m
[30;1m56 | [0m[35mand a C extension that is highly optimized to improve row data reading.[0m
